org.opends.sdk.requests
Class AbstractExtendedRequest<R extends ExtendedRequest<S>,S extends Result>

java.lang.Object
  org.opends.sdk.requests.AbstractExtendedRequest<R,S>
Type Parameters:
R - The type of extended request.
S - The type of result.
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExtendedRequest<S>, Request
Direct Known Subclasses:
CancelRequest, GetConnectionIDRequest, GetSymmetricKeyRequest, PasswordModifyRequest, PasswordPolicyStateExtendedOperation.Request, StartTLSRequest, WhoAmIRequest
public abstract class AbstractExtendedRequest<R extends ExtendedRequest<S>,S extends Result>
extends Object
implements ExtendedRequest<S>

An abstract Extended request which can be used as the basis for implementing new Extended operations.

Constructor Summary
protected AbstractExtendedRequest()
          Creates a new abstract extended request.

getControls

public final Iterable<Control> getControls()
Returns an Iterable containing the controls included with this request. The returned Iterable may be used to remove controls if permitted by this request.
